result.arabic_text: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْۚ وَٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
result.translation: 45. Tokkel tama mari inkih Bakkiimeeh num keenik maraaqinna, Yallal koroositeeniih kay farmoytit dirabboysaanamal sinni nafsi yudlumen waqdi, fayla Yallay ginó Rabbih yani-lc, isi farmoytit cateeh koros finqiseemil.
